question.text: Ultraform is very resistant against many chemicals, but there are some exceptions, which of the following?
Which of the following statement is true?

answers.answer: Ultraform can be homo- or a copolymer depending on the grade.

question.text: Which Ultraform grade has the highest flowability?
What is a specific advantage of Ultraform compared to other semi-crystalline polymers?

answers.answer: Low swelling when in contact with all types of fuels
